AboutUs.policyDesc: We are focused on fighting for developer rights by shaping the policies that promote their interests and the future.
AboutUs.aboutMetaDescription: Upgrade your resume to the future with mobile responsive, sharable & passcode protected version.
AboutUs.missionDesc: Empower job seekers with latest mobile-responsive, sharable & passcode-protected resume technology to stay competitive & improve chances of getting hired.
AboutUs.visionDesc: Revolutionize the way resumes are created & shared, providing job seekers with cutting-edge technology to stand out and secure employment quickly & easily.
AboutUs.socialDesc: Learn about how LeetCV's people, products, and platform that are creating positive and lasting change around the world.
AboutUs.title: About | LeetCV
AboutUs.headingOne: Where the world builds the Resume
AboutUs.paragraph: Elevate your job search with cutting-edge, mobile-responsive resumes. Easily shareable and passcode-protected, these resumes adapt to any device for seamless reading and secure your personal information. Impress potential employers with a modern, standout resume today!
AboutUs.aboutDescOne: In the digital job market, update and optimize your resume, move beyond traditional PDFs.
AboutUs.aboutDescTwo: A mobile-responsive, shareable resume ensures seamless reading on all devices, from computers to smartphones.
AboutUs.aboutDescThree: New-age resumes are shareable via email or LinkedIn, simplifying applications for multiple roles.
AboutUs.aboutDescFour: Security is vital, passcode protection ensures confidentiality amid frequent data breaches.
AboutUs.aboutDescFive: A mobile-responsive, shareable, passcode-protected resume showcases adaptability and market awareness.
AboutUs.aboutDescSix: Modern resumes boost visibility and hiring chances. Upgrade now and embrace the future!

Footer.paragraph: Resume of the future. For 20+ years we have been using PDF for resume, it is time to move forward to the new age of mobile responsive, sharable, passcode protected.
Footer.latestNews: The latest news, articles, and resources, sent to your inbox weekly.
Footer.scanQrCode: Scan the QR code to download the app.

Appbar.title: LeetCV
Appbar.quote: Checkout the resume. Click on the url to visit on the profile.
Appbar.signOutWarningOne: Signing out will prevent you from receiving push notifications on this device.
Appbar.signOutWarningTwo: Signing out will prevent you from notifying you of requests to view your resume.
Appbar.logOutTitle: Are you sure you want to sign out?
Appbar.logOutDescription: Signing out will prevent you from receiving push notifications on this device and notifying you of requests to view your resume.
